content:
I'm glad you're excited to try out the tips! However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have real-time information about specific stores or their current sales. I exist solely as a digital entity, so I don't have the ability to know about local stores or their inventory.

But I can suggest a few things to help you find the information you're looking for:

1. Check the auto store's website: You can visit the website of the auto store on Main Street to see if they have an online catalog or a section for current sales and promotions.
2. Call the store directly: Give the store a call and ask about any sales or discounts on air fresheners or microfiber cloths. They'll be able to provide you with the most up-to-date information.
3. Check online retailers: You can also check online retailers like Amazon or other auto parts websites to see if they have any sales or discounts on the products you need.
4. Sign up for their newsletter: If you haven't already, consider signing up for the auto store's newsletter or loyalty program. They often send out exclusive offers and promotions to their subscribers.

I hope these suggestions help you find the information you need!
